description: This file defines a React functional component called 'Modal' that renders a customizable modal dialog. It displays a title, children content, and action buttons which can be customized via props. The modal is conditionally rendered based on the 'open' prop and includes accessibility attributes.

methods.name: Modal({ open, title, children, actions = [], onClose })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a modal dialog with optional actions and accessibility features.

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Modal({ open, title, children, actions = [], onClose }) {$/
